verses.verse: And it came <WG1096> to pass, that when <WG3753> Jesus <WG2424> had finished <WG5055> these <WG5128> sayings, <WG3056> he departed <WG3332> from Galilee, <WG1056> and came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the coasts <WG3725> of Judaea <WG2449> beyond <WG4008> Jordan; <WG2446>
And great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> followed <WG190> him; and he healed <WG2323> them there. <WG1563>

The Pharisees <WG5330> also <WG2532> came <WG4334> to him, tempting <WG3985> him, and saying <WG3004> to him, Is it lawful <WG1832> for a man <WG444> to put <WG630> away <WG630> his wife <WG1135> for every <WG3956> cause? <WG156>

And he answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to them, Have you not read, <WG314> that he which <WG3588> made <WG4160> them at <WG575> the beginning <WG746> made <WG4160> them male <WG730> and female, <WG2338>

And said, <WG2036> For this <WG5127> cause <WG1752> shall a man <WG444> leave <WG2641> father <WG3962> and mother, <WG3384> and shall join <WG4347> to his wife: <WG1135> and they two <WG1417> shall be one <WG3391> flesh? <WG4561>

Why <WG5620> they are no <WG3765> more <WG3765> two, <WG1417> but one <WG3391> flesh. <WG4561> What <WG3739> therefore <WG3767> God <WG2316> has joined <WG4801> together, <WG4801> let not man <WG444> put <WG5563> asunder. <WG5563>
They say <WG3004> to him, Why <WG5101> did Moses <WG3475> then <WG3767> command <WG1781> to give <WG1325> a writing <WG975> of divorce, <WG647> and to put <WG630> her away? <WG630>

He said <WG3004> to them, Moses <WG3475> because <WG4314> of the hardness <WG4641> of your <WG5216> hearts <WG4641> suffered <WG2010> you to put <WG630> away <WG630> your <WG5216> wives: <WG1135> but from the beginning <WG746> it was not so. <WG3779>

And I say <WG3004> to you, Whoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall put <WG630> away <WG630> his wife, <WG1135> except <WG1508> it be for fornication, <WG4202> and shall marry <WG1060> another, <WG243> commits <WG3429> adultery: <WG3429> and whoever <WG3588> marries <WG1060> her which <WG3588> is put <WG630> away <WG630> does commit <WG3429> adultery. <WG3429>
His disciples <WG3101> say <WG3004> to him, If <WG1487> the case <WG156> of the man <WG444> be so <WG3779> with his wife, <WG1135> it is not good <WG4851> to marry. <WG1060>
But he said <WG2036> to them, All <WG3956> men cannot <WG3756> receive <WG5562> this <WG5126> saying, <WG3056> save <WG235> they to whom <WG3739> it is given. <WG1325>

For there are some eunuchs, <WG2135> which <WG3748> were so <WG3779> born <WG1080> from their mother's <WG3384> womb: <WG2836> and there are some eunuchs, <WG2134> which <WG3748> were made <WG2134> eunuchs <WG2134> of men: <WG444> and there be eunuchs, <WG2135> which <WG3748> have made <WG2134> themselves <WG1438> eunuchs <WG2134> for the kingdom <WG932> of heaven's <WG3772> sake. He that is able <WG1410> to receive <WG5562> it, let him receive <WG5562> it.

Then <WG5119> were there brought <WG4374> to him little <WG3813> children, <WG3813> that he should put <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> them, and pray: <WG4336> and the disciples <WG3101> rebuked <WG2008> them.

But Jesus <WG2424> said, <WG2036> Suffer <WG863> little <WG3813> children, <WG3813> and forbid <WG2967> them not, to come <WG2064> to me: for of such <WG5108> is the kingdom <WG932> of heaven. <WG3772>
And he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> them, and departed <WG4198> there. <WG1564>

And, behold, <WG2400> one <WG1520> came <WG4334> and said <WG2036> to him, Good <WG18> Master, <WG1320> what <WG5101> good <WG18> thing shall I do, <WG4160> that I may have <WG2192> eternal <WG166> life? <WG2222>

And he said <WG2036> to him, Why <WG5101> call <WG3004> you me good? <WG18> there is none <WG3762> good <WG18> but one, <WG1520> that is, God: <WG2316> but if <WG1487> you will <WG2309> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> life, <WG2222> keep <WG5083> the commandments. <WG1785>

He said <WG3004> to him, Which? <WG4169> Jesus <WG2424> said, <WG2036> You shall do no <WG3756> murder, <WG5407> You shall not commit <WG3431> adultery, <WG3431> You shall not steal, <WG2813> You shall not bear <WG5576> false <WG5576> witness, <WG5576>
Honor <WG5091> your father <WG3962> and your mother: <WG3384> and, You shall love <WG25> your neighbor <WG4139> as yourself. <WG4572>
The young <WG3495> man <WG3495> said <WG3004> to him, All <WG3956> these <WG5023> things have I kept <WG5442> from my youth <WG3503> up: what <WG5101> lack <WG5302> I yet? <WG2089>

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> to him, If <WG1487> you will <WG2309> be perfect, <WG5046> go <WG5217> and sell <WG4453> that you have, <WG5224> and give <WG1325> to the poor, <WG4434> and you shall have <WG2192> treasure <WG2344> in heaven: <WG3772> and come <WG1204> and follow <WG190> me.
But when the young <WG3495> man <WG3495> heard <WG191> that saying, <WG3056> he went <WG565> away <WG565> sorrowful: <WG3076> for he had <WG2258> <WG2192> great <WG4183> possessions. <WG2933>

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> Jesus <WG2424> to his disciples, <WG3101> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, That a rich <WG4145> man <WG3495> shall hardly <WG1423> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven. <WG3772>

And again <WG3825> I say <WG3004> to you, It is easier <WG2123> for a camel <WG2574> to go <WG1330> through <WG1223> the eye <WG5169> of a needle, <WG4476> than <WG2228> for a rich <WG4145> man <WG3495> to enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>
When his disciples <WG3101> heard <WG191> it, they were exceedingly <WG4970> amazed, <WG1605> saying, <WG3004> Who <WG5101> then <WG686> can <WG1410> be saved? <WG4982>
But Jesus <WG2424> beheld <WG1689> them, and said <WG2036> to them, With men <WG444> this <WG5124> is impossible; <WG102> but with God <WG2316> all <WG3956> things are possible. <WG1415>

Then <WG5119> answered <WG611> Peter <WG4074> and said <WG2036> to him, Behold, <WG2400> we have forsaken <WG863> all, <WG3956> and followed <WG190> you; what <WG5101> shall we have <WG1510> therefore? <WG686>

And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to them, Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, That you which <WG3588> have followed <WG190> me, in the regeneration <WG3824> when <WG3752> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall sit <WG2523> in the throne <WG2362> of his glory, <WG1391> you also <WG2532> shall sit <WG2523> on twelve <WG1427> thrones, <WG2362> judging <WG2919> the twelve <WG1427> tribes <WG5443> of Israel. <WG2474>

And every <WG3956> one that has forsaken <WG863> houses, <WG3614> or <WG2228> brothers, <WG80> or <WG2228> sisters, <WG79> or <WG2228> father, <WG3962> or <WG2228> mother, <WG3384> or <WG2228> wife, <WG1135> or <WG2228> children, <WG5043> or <WG2228> lands, <WG68> for my name's <WG3686> sake, <WG1752> shall receive <WG2983> an hundred times, <WG1542> and shall inherit <WG2816> everlasting <WG166> life. <WG2222>
But many <WG4183> that are first <WG4413> shall be last; <WG2078> and the last <WG2078> shall be first. <WG4413>
